So, starting with the

Mueller says that his hands are tied

Specifically, Mueller says that the power

quote neutral adjudicatory forum

100% true that things like

that because Mr. Mueller

cannot indict the president

cannot clear his name,

Mueller notes that these
considerations disappear

In other words, Mueller

it's a whole different ballgame.

And in other places,

"The president's efforts to

It's hard to read these sections

conclusion that Mr. Mueller

thought President Trump

at the start of this investigation.
Because obstruction of justice includes

in the same way that

is attempted murder, even
